mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_company_profit_detail (merchant_id, payment_sn, channel_type, total_fee, wait_shall_amount, wait_shall_origin_amount, profit_type, channel_cost, channel_shall_amount, product_shall_amount, status )VALUES( #{merchantId}, #{paymentSn}, #{channelType}, #{totalFee}, #{waitShallAmount}, #{waitShallOriginAmount}, #{profitType}, #{channelCost}, #{channelShallAmount}, #{productShallAmount}, #{status} )
